title: That Way Exists Huh!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>So the other day, Ai was called a “demon” on Nijigaku’s group study session~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Well, what happened?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm, Ai might have been harsh that time. But if that happens again, Ai wonders what Ai can do to get everyone motivated. What would you do, Dia?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I don’t think being harsh to teach someone is a bad thing, Ai-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Well~ Ai doesn’t think being overly harsh is good either though~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>If there’s an adequate reason for you to do so, then it’s the right thing to do. Please don’t beat yourself up too much<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>D-, Dia~~....!  Ai just need to stop worrying about it, and think of a better idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>First, compliments. Once they’re in a good mood, you can just go with the flow<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>A-, amazing….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
